metadata.title: CVE-2020-10936 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - high.
metadata.description:
Sympa before 6.2.56 allows privilege escalation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-10936` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sympa - 6.2.60~dfsg-4build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sympa package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.60~dfsg-4build1').
